statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -11 \\ -9 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -9 \\ -11 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -6 \\ -14 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -46 \\ 38 \\ 37 \\ -45 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
